name: Wangan Warrior X Demo
detailed_description:
Try before you buy! Race along Japan's highways in one of three cars you get to pick from and feel the adrenaline rush you get from racing some of Japan's biggest rivals. This demo is fully functioning and has no time-limits or handicaps, however there is no save data and limted customization compared to the main game.

NOTE: SAVE DATA IS NOT SAVED OR TRANSFERRED WHEN PURCHASING THE FULL GAME.
about_the_game:

short_description: Try before you buy! Race along Japan's highways in one of three cars you get to pick from and feel the adrenaline rush you get from racing some of Japan's biggest rivals.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD, Radeon HD)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8192 MB available space
